articles.author: Yer Maum
articles.title: Your Friend Is a Stallion
articles.lede: Your friend Rosco is a total stallion. Click to read about how hard I rode him last night.
articles.content: No, really, he's actually a horse. His coat was in such a lather when I got through with him. Symphyrophus Rahonavis Glacialisaurus Epanterias Fusuisaurus Nectosaurus Tetragonosaurus Hypsibema Angaturama Jaklapallisaurus Atrociraptor Microhadrosaurus Chinshakiangosaurus Anchiceratops.

articles.author: Hester Panim
articles.title: Why Did Stephen Colbert Call Steve Bannon a Total Cuck?
articles.lede: Last night on the Late Show, Stephen Colbert called Steve Bannon a cuck. Find out why.
articles.content: Steve Bannon said if he were removed from the Security Council,, he would leave the White House. Then, when he was removed from the Security Council, he didn't leave the White House. What a loser. Total cuck move, bro. Pteropelyx Phaedrolosaurus Cucklesaurus Dinodocus Huehuecanauhtlus Picrodon Harpymimus Lophostropheus Koreaceratops Tangvayosaurus Saurornithoides Succinodon Patagonykus Aegyptosaurus Ekrixinatosaurus.
